languages.text: "Сервиторы? Вот как..." {n}Клеменциа в задумчивости складывает руки на груди и напряженно хмурится.{/n} "Я встречала таких сервиторов, с первого взгляда не отличимых от обычных людей с аугментами, но лишь единожды — в сопровождении нескольких представителей семейства Гапрак".

traits.locale_text: "Сервиторы? Вот как..." {n}Клеменциа в задумчивости складывает руки на груди и напряженно хмурится.{/n} "Я встречала таких сервиторов, с первого взгляда не отличимых от обычных людей с аугментами, но лишь единожды — в сопровождении нескольких представителей семейства Гапрак".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms and furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I have encountered servitors that were indistinguishable from normal augmented humans, but only once. They were accompanying several members of House Gaprak."
languages.original_text: "Сервиторы? Вот как..." {n}Клеменциа в задумчивости складывает руки на груди и напряженно хмурится.{/n} "Я встречала таких сервиторов, с первого взгляда не отличимых от обычных людей с аугментами, но лишь единожды — в сопровождении нескольких представителей семейства Гапрак".

traits.locale_text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms on her chest and tensely furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I did meet such servitors who are indistinguishable from the normal humans with augments, but only once — they were accompanying some members of House Gaprak."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms on her chest and tensely furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I did meet such servitors who are indistinguishable from the normal humans with augments, but only once — they were accompanying some members of House Gaprak."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms on her chest and tensely furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I did meet such servitors who were indistinguishable from the normal humans with augments, but only once. They were accompanying some members of House Gaprak."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms on her chest and tensely furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I did meet such servitors who were indistinguishable from the normal humans with augments, but only once. They were accompanying some members of House Gaprak."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms and furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I have encountered servitors that were indistinguishable from normal augmented humans, but only once. They were accompanying several members of House Gaprak."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms and furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I have encountered servitors that were indistinguishable from normal augmented humans, but only once. They were accompanying several members of House Gaprak."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「サーヴィター？でしたら…」{n}クレメンティアは腕を組んで眉をひそめ、深く考え込む{/n}「そのようなサーヴィターを見たことがあります。オーグメティックをつけた普通の人間と見分けがつかない者を。ですが、一度きりです。ギャプラック家の者が連れていました」
languages.original_text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms and furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I have encountered servitors that were indistinguishable from normal augmented humans, but only once. They were accompanying several members of House Gaprak."

traits.locale_text: 「サーヴィター？でしたら…」{n}クレメンティアは腕を組んで眉をひそめ、深く考え込む{/n}「そのようなサーヴィターを見たことがあります。オーグメティックをつけた普通の人間と見分けがつかない者を。ですが、一度きりです。ギャプラック家の者が連れていました」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “机仆？原来如此……”{n}克莱门缇雅抱起手臂，皱着眉头陷入了沉思。{/n}“我确实遇到过这样的机仆，他们看上去很像佩戴植入物的普通人。不过，这种机仆我只见过一次，他们是贾帕克家族的仆从。”
languages.original_text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms and furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I have encountered servitors that were indistinguishable from normal augmented humans, but only once. They were accompanying several members of House Gaprak."

traits.locale_text: “奴工？原来如此……”{n}克莱门缇雅抱起手臂，皱着眉头陷入了沉思。{/n}“我确实遇到过这样的奴工，他们看上去很像佩戴植入物的普通人。不过，这种奴工我只见过一次，他们是贾帕克家族的仆从。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Des servitors... ? Hum... » {n}dit-elle tout en croisant les bras et en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} « J'ai déjà rencontré des servitors impossibles à distinguer de vrais humains, une fois. Ils accompagnaient des membres de la maison Gaprak. »
languages.original_text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms and furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I have encountered servitors that were indistinguishable from normal augmented humans, but only once. They were accompanying several members of House Gaprak."

traits.locale_text: « Des servitors... ? Hum... {n}dit-elle tout en croisant les bras et en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} J'ai déjà rencontré des servitors impossibles à distinguer de vrais humains. Ils accompagnaient des membres de la maison Gaprak. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «¿Servidores? ¿Ah, sí?». {n}Clementia cruza los brazos y frunce el ceño, pensativa.{/n} «Solo he encontrado servidores que fueran idénticos a humanos con aumentos una vez. Iban acompañados de varios miembros de la casa Gaprak».
languages.original_text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms and furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I have encountered servitors that were indistinguishable from normal augmented humans, but only once. They were accompanying several members of House Gaprak."

traits.locale_text: «¿Servidores? ¿Ah, sí? {n}Clementia cruza los brazos y frunce el ceño, pensativa.{/n} «Solo he coincidido con servidores que fueran idénticos a humanos con aumentos una vez. Iban acompañados de algunos miembros de la casa Gaprak».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Servitoren? Tatsächlich ..." {n}Clementia verschränkt die Arme und runzelt nachdenklich die Stirn.{/n} "Ich bin schon Servitoren begegnet, die sich nicht von normalen augmentierten Menschen unterscheiden ließen, allerdings nur ein einziges Mal. Sie haben Mitglieder des Hauses Gaprak begleitet."
languages.original_text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms and furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I have encountered servitors that were indistinguishable from normal augmented humans, but only once. They were accompanying several members of House Gaprak."

traits.locale_text: "Servitoren? Tatsächlich ..." {n}Clementia verschränkt die Arme vor der Brust und runzelt nachdenklich die Stirn.{/n} "Ich bin solchen Servitoren begegnet, die nicht von normalen Menschen mit Augmentationen zu unterscheiden waren. Allerdings nur ein einziges Mal. Sie haben Mitglieder des Hauses Gaprak begleitet."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Hizmetörler mi? Demek öyle..." {n}Düşüncelere dalan Clementia, kollarını birleştirip kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Bir keresinde bildiğimiz ogmentli insanlara tıpatıp benzeyen hizmetörler görmüştüm. Bazı Gaprak Hanesi mensuplarına eşlik ediyorlardı."
languages.original_text: "Servitors? Is that so..." {n}Clementia crosses her arms and furrows her brow, deep in thought.{/n} "I have encountered servitors that were indistinguishable from normal augmented humans, but only once. They were accompanying several members of House Gaprak."

traits.locale_text: "Hizmetörler mi? Demek öyle..." {n}Düşüncelere dalan Clementia, kollarını birleştirip kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Bir keresinde bildiğimiz ogmentli insanlara tıpatıp benzeyen hizmetörler görmüştüm. Bazı Gaprak Hanesi mensuplarına eşlik ediyorlardı."
traits.speaker: Clemence
